text: Democratic Convention (, CD) was a political party in San Marino. ==History== The party contested the 1998 elections in an alliance with the Sammarinese Democratic Progressive Party (PPDS) and Ideas in Motion. The alliance received 18.6% of the vote, winning 11 of the 60 seats in the Grand and General Council, becoming the third-largest faction.Dieter Nohlen & Philip Stöver (2010) Elections in Europe: A data handbook, p1691 ==References== Category:Defunct political parties in San Marino
title: Democratic Convention (San Marino)
